site.name: Euro Agri Trading s.r.o — Trusted Agro Broker
hero.title: AGRO SERVICES — Trusted EU–Egypt Fertilizer Brokerage
hero.desc: We connect certified Egyptian fertilizer producers with global buyers, offering factory-direct pricing, transparent processes, and full EU compliance.
hero.tradeNote: All transactions comply with Incoterms® 2020 and international trade standards.
hero.mainProduct: Rock Phosphate — P₂O₅: 18–32% (subject to availability & shipment-specific COA) (Ref. sample: 26%)
hero.specTags: P₂O₅: 18–32% (subject to availability & shipment-specific COA) / Key components available in COA
hero.spec1: Screened material — suitable for milling or direct application.
hero.spec2: Specification sheet included; custom lab analysis available upon request.
hero.comp: Grade range: P₂O₅ 18–32% (subject to availability & shipment-specific COA). Key components available in COA (e.g., CaO, SiO₂, Al₂O₃, Fe₂O₃, MgO, SO₃, Cl, LOI).
hero.sizing: Sizing: Customized sizing upon request (sieving on request)
products.title: Flagship Product
products.lead: Rock Phosphate — Grades 18–32% P₂O₅ (subject to availability & shipment-specific COA) (reference sample: 26%)
products.spec1: Screened granulometry — ready for milling or direct application
products.spec2: Specification sheet included; buyer-specific analyses available
services.quality.text: Independent testing can be arranged via SGS / Intertek / BV (upon request) to support compliance and quality assurance.
services.analysis.text: Third-party laboratory verification can be arranged (SGS / Intertek / BV) as agreed, including shipment-specific reports when required.
card.rock.title: Rock Phosphate — Grades 18–32% P₂O₅
card.rock.text: Reliable source with consolidated shipments to EU ports, with competitive pricing directly from the factory. Final values are confirmed by shipment-specific COA/SGS.
card.urea.title: Urea / NPK (on request)
card.urea.text: Additional lines (Urea, MAP/DAP, NPK) can be added per demand, with flexible supply options.
card.custom.title: Custom specs
card.custom.text: Tailored supply, packing, and analyses per buyer requirements, with official documentation support.
coa.title: Sample Specification Sheet — Rock Phosphate (Reference: 26% P₂O₅)
coa.sub: Marketing sample for presentation only. Final values are confirmed per shipment via COA/SGS. Other grades (18–32% P₂O₅) are subject to availability & shipment-specific COA.
sieve.title: Sieving Analysis — Rock Phosphate (Sample)
log.title: Logistics & Compliance
log.incoterms: Available shipping terms include EX-WORK, FOB, CFR, CIF, and DDP. Final terms are confirmed in the contract. Shipment updates are shared via email after booking confirmation.
log.ports: Ports: Egypt (multiple ports subject to schedule)
log.ports.p: Shipping: Bulk vessel or 20’ containers. Packing options: Bulk with liner or Jumbo bags (upon request).
log.compliance.p: Documentation includes certificate of origin, invoices, and analysis reports. Full compliance with EU standards and product safety regulations.
how.title: How We Work (EU Brokerage & Risk-Control)
how.lead: Euro Agri Trading s.r.o. operates as an independent EU-based brokerage and coordination company. We connect verified suppliers with qualified buyers and support the transaction process in a structured and compliant manner.
how.policyLead: To protect all parties and ensure professional execution, we follow standard international trade practices:
how.p3: Independent inspection at loading: SGS / Intertek / BV (as agreed)
how.p4: Shipment-specific documentation: COA/SGS per shipment; heavy metals (e.g., Cd) included upon request/market requirement
how.p5: Buyer-facing documents: full originals and shipment-specific certificates are shared with verified buyers upon request
how.noteText: Euro Agri Trading s.r.o. is not a contracting party to the sales contract between seller and buyer. The sales contract, delivery terms, and performance obligations are agreed directly between the seller and buyer, supported by LC conditions and third-party inspection.
compliance.title: Compliance & Verification
compliance.lead: Specifications shown are marketing guidance. Final values are confirmed by shipment-specific COA/SGS for each lot.
compliance.p1: Shipment-specific COA / SGS (or equivalent) is available per shipment
compliance.p2: Heavy metals (Cd, etc.) can be provided upon request in the shipment COA
compliance.p3: Full original documents are shared with verified buyers only
compliance.p4: Low-Cadmium 31–32% is marketed only after receiving a shipment-specific COA showing Cd and heavy metals
cert.title: Product Specifications & Compliance Documents
cert.note: Note: The documents displayed below are simplified marketing versions. Full originals and shipment-specific certificates can be provided to verified buyers upon request.
lowcad.imgAlt: Low-Cadmium Rock Phosphate (31–32% P₂O₅) — Coming soon
sgs.title: Independent Inspection & Verification (SGS / Intertek / BV)
sgs.sub: Shipment-specific inspection documentation is available per shipment as agreed.
eu.title: EU Compliance Documents
eu.sub: Certificates of origin, invoices, and analysis reports. Full compliance with applicable EU standards and product safety regulations.
msds.title: MSDS Summary — EU REACH
msds.sub: Material Safety Data Sheet (summary) for compliance and safe handling guidance.
lowcad.title: Low-Cadmium Rock Phosphate (31–32% P₂O₅)
lowcad.sub: Coming soon / upon request. Marketed only after receiving shipment-specific third-party COA/inspection (SGS/Intertek/BV) confirming Cd & heavy metals (ppm/mg/kg) for the actual lot.
about.title: About us
about.p1: Euro Agri Trading s.r.o. is an EU-based brokerage and coordination company connecting qualified buyers with verified suppliers.
about.pricing: We support the process with transparent coordination and competitive terms based on verified sourcing.
about.p2: Independent inspection (SGS / Intertek / BV) and samples are available upon request prior to contracting.
about.p3: We support the transaction workflow and document handling. The sales contract and performance obligations are agreed directly between the seller and the buyer.
payment.details: Bank details for each currency (IBAN / SWIFT / Routing) are provided on the invoice or to verified buyers upon request.
contact.title: Get in touch
form.name: Name
contact.note: We do not use analytics cookies. This form opens your mail app to send the message directly.
contact.docs: Official documents (contracts, invoices, shipment-specific COA/SGS, and product specifications) are shared after qualifying the request.
footer.payment: All payments and trade settlements are conducted directly between the buyer and the seller. Euro Agri Trading s.r.o. acts solely as an independent EU-based intermediary, providing coordination and process support.
footer.note: © 2025 — Independent broker/marketer. Trademarks belong to their respective owners. This website is for commercial information only.
